wikipedia_page.main: Maria Rebecca Davison (1780?–1858), was a British actress.

response: It premiered at the Theatre Royal, Drury Lane, on 31 January 1805; Maria Rebecca Davison played Juliana. It opened in Edinburgh on 14 November 1809, with Henry Siddons playing the Duke.  It was revived at Drury Lane on 30 June 1827.
